perks.title: Revive
perks.description: Allows Medikits to revive critically wounded Soldiers at 33% of maximum health instead of just stabilizing them.

perks.title: Grenadier
perks.description: Allows 2 destructive grenades in a single inventory slot, and the soldier may throw grenades 20 percent further.

perks.title: Sapper
perks.description: Your grenades do additional damage to enemies, and all your weapons do additional damage to the environment(+1 damage with AP and HE grenades, +2 damage with Alien grenades and triple environmental damage for all weapons).

perks.title: Repair
perks.description: Grants +2 Arc Thrower charges

perks.title: Bombard
perks.description: Throw or launch grenades over exceptionally long distances(+50%).

perks.title: Smoke Grenade
perks.description: Deploy a smoke grenade once per mission. The smoke confers +20 defense to all units, not just allies, and lasts through the enemy turn. Taking the perk on level up also allows an additional action after deploying a smoke grenade.

perks.title: Paramedic
perks.description: Once per turn, this unit may use a medikit without spending an action.

perks.title: Field Surgeon
perks.description: Has a 75% chance to reduce or eliminate recovery time of non-critically wounded soldiers. Automatic reduction if multiple medics on a mission have this perk. Does not affect wound sustained by sending fatigued soldier on a mission.

perks.title: Dense Smoke
perks.description: Smoke Grenades have increased area of effect and further increase units' Defense by 20.

perks.title: Packmaster
perks.description: Limited-use small items and mechanized unit subsystems in your inventory receive additional uses.

perks.title: Savior
perks.description: Medikits restore six more health per use; Restorative Mist units restore three more health per use.

perks.title: Battle Scanner
perks.description: Scanning device that, when thrown, creates a new source of vision for 2 turns. Can only be used 2 times per battle.

perks.title: Smoke and Mirrors
perks.description: Allows one additional use of all support grenades during each mission. It also increases charges from Smoke Grenade and Battlescanner perks by 1.

perks.title: Damn Good Ground
perks.description: Confers +10 Aim and +10 Defense against enemies at lower elevation, in addition to the usual elevation bonuses.

perks.title: Squadsight
perks.description: Allows firing at targets in any ally's sight radius within weapon range, but critical chance suffers a -30% penalty. Extended range weapons (MEC primary weapons, Marksman and Strike Rifles, and LMGs) gain roughly five extra tiles range. Sniper rifles have infinite range. Overwatch fire does not extend to squadsight ranges, except with Marksman's and Strike Rifles.

perks.title: Low Profile
perks.description: Makes partial cover grant the defense bonus of full cover.

perks.title: Lone Wolf
perks.description: +10 Aim and Critical Chance if not within 7 tiles of an allied unit.

perks.title: Disabling Shot
perks.description: Allows sniper rifles to fire a shot that causes the target's main weapon to malfunction. The target may use Reload to fix the weapon. 2 turn cooldown. Cannot cause critical hits.

perks.title: Precision Shot
perks.description: With sniper/long rifles: Fire a shot with +30% critical chance, no -30% squadsight penalty to criticals, and extra damage on critical hits based on the soldier's weapon tech level. With Marksman's and Strike Rifles: Fire an unlimited range shot with no other bonuses. 2 turn cooldown.

perks.title: In The Zone
perks.description: Killing a flanked or uncovered target does not cost an action. Confers increasing critical hit penalty for each successive In The Zone shot.

perks.title: HEAT Ammo
perks.description: Your primary weapon does additional damage against robotic enemies(+75%).

perks.title: Holo-Targeting
perks.description: Shooting at, flushing out or suppressing enemies also confers +10 Aim to allies' attacks on those enemies.

perks.title: Double Tap
perks.description: Allows both actions to be used for Standard Shot, Headshot, or Disable Shot, provided no costly actions were taken, 1 turn cooldown.

perks.title: Run & Gun
perks.description: Allows firing or Overwatch after Dashing on the turn Run and Gun is activated. 2 turn cooldown.

perks.title: Light 'Em Up
perks.description: Standard shots no longer end the turn, if taken as the first action

perks.title: Flush
perks.description: Fire a shot that causes enemies to run out of cover. The shot is easy to hit with, but does reduced damage.

perks.title: Executioner
perks.description: Confers +10 aim and +10 critical chance against targets at or below 50% health.

perks.title: Aggression
perks.description: Confers +10% critical chance per enemy in sight (max +30%).

perks.title: Opportunist
perks.description: Eliminates the Aim penalty on reaction shots, and allows reaction shots to cause critical hits.

perks.title: Suppression
perks.description: Fire a barrage that pins down a target, granting reaction fire against it and imposing a -30 penalty to Aim and reduced range of many area-of-effect attacks, including grenades. Gunners using an LMG-class weapon also get Opportunist bonus when taking a suppression-based reaction fire shot.

perks.title: Sharpshooter
perks.description: +10 critical chance in all situations, +10 Aim against enemies in full cover.

perks.title: Lock N' Load
perks.description: rimary weapons receive one additional shot or burst before a reload is required, and you may reload your primary weapon as the first action of your turn without ending the turn.

perks.title: Covering Fire
perks.description: Allows reaction shots to trigger on enemy attacks, not just movement.

perks.title: Sentinel
perks.description: Allows two reaction shots during Overwatch, instead of only one.

perks.title: Combat Drugs
perks.description: Smoke grenades now contain powerful stimulants that grant +20 Will, +20% critical chance, and +20 defense for all units in the cloud.

perks.title: Close Combat Specialist
perks.description: Confers a reaction shot against any enemy who closes to within 4 tiles. Does not require Overwatch. Warning: Will activate even if unit is concealed.

perks.title: Steadfast
perks.description: Never panic as a result of getting wounded, allies panicking, allies getting wounded or killed, or the intimidation ability.

perks.title: Gunslinger
perks.description: Confers +1 damage with sidearms and negates the long-range accuracy penalty when shooting beyond 14 meters.

perks.title: Tactical Sense
perks.description: Confers +5 Defense per enemy in sight (max +20).

perks.title: Aggression
perks.description: Confers +10% critical chance per enemy in sight (max +30%).

perks.title: Hit and Run
perks.description: Your first standard shot of each turn against an uncovered or flanked target does not cost an action. Does not work against flying units, and cannot be used if Run N' Gun activated.

perks.title: Close Encounters
perks.description: The first standard shot made within 4 tiles of the target does not cost an action. Cannot combine with Run And Gun.

perks.title: Rapid Fire
perks.description: Take two shots against a single target in quick succession. Each shot carries a -15 penalty to Aim

perks.title: Extra Conditioning
perks.description: Confers bonus health based on which type of armor is equipped. Heavier armor increases the bonus.

perks.title: Killer Instinct
perks.description: Activating Run & Gun now also grants +50% critical damage for the rest of the turn.

perks.title: Ranger
perks.description: Primary weapons, Rocket Launchers and MEC secondary systems do one additional damage.

perks.title: Will To Survive
perks.description: Reduces all normal damage taken by 1 or 2 points if in cover and not flanked.

perks.title: Bring 'Em On
perks.description: Adds 1 damage on critical hits for each enemy the unit can see (up to +6).

perks.title: Sprinter
perks.description: Grants +4 mobility (roughly 3 tiles movement).

perks.title: Vital Point Targeting
perks.description: Confers 2 bonus damage with primary guns, and +1 damage with sidearms, against humans and alien targets whose species have been autopsied.

perks.title: Resilience
perks.description: Confers immunity to critical hits.

perks.title: Lightning Reflexes
perks.description: The hit chance of reaction fire against this unit is reduced by 90 percent for the first shot, and by 70 percent for additional shots.

perks.title: Fire Rocket
perks.description: Fire a high explosive rocket using an equipped launcher.

perks.title: Rapid Reaction
perks.description: If on Overwatch, confers a bonus reaction shot (to a maximum three shots total) for every reaction shot that is a hit.

perks.title: HEAT Warheads
perks.description: Your rockets and grenades do additional damage to robotic enemies(+75%).

perks.title: Fire In The Hole
perks.description: Grants +10 aim for purposes of reducing scatter if the soldier has not moved this turn. Increases range of non-scattering rockets.

perks.title: Snapshot
perks.description: For snipers, removes the sniper rifle's restriction on firing and Overwatch after taking a costly action. Any shots taken after using any costly action suffer a -10 Aim penalty. For rocketeers, reduces the aim penalty for launching a rocket after taking a costly action.

perks.title: Shredder Ammo
perks.description: Any unit hit takes additional damage from all sources for the next 4 turns. Rocketeers get special purpose Shredder rockets while a Gunner's LMG is loaded with Shredder ammo. Shredder rockets are weaker than a standard rocket and cannot penetrate cover.

perks.title: Ready For Anything
perks.description: If the unit fires without moving, it automatically enters overwatch at the end of its turn.

perks.title: Danger Zone
perks.description: Increases area of effect of Suppression, rockets, grenade launchers and proximity mine launchers.

perks.title: Mayhem
perks.description: Confers 2 damage when suppressing. Also confers +1 damage for most explosive grenades, proximity mines and Rocket Launcher ammo. Confers +2 damage for SAW- and LMG- series weapons, Recoilless Rifle and Blaster Launcher ammo, and alien grenades. Confers +4 damage for sniper and long rifles, marksman's, strike and reflex rifles.

perks.title: Javelin Rockets
perks.description: Your rockets now travel much further(+33%) and can hit targets beyond your visual range.

perks.title: Shock and Awe
perks.description: Allows 1 additional standard rocket to be fired per battle.
